replies.body:
Great skin, but for the wrong champ in my opinion.

Elderwood Kindred would have been a far better choice i reckon. Thematically.
Nothing stopping something like that from happening. It's a cool skin line and I suspect we'll see it on some more champs in future.

hey rito do u reckon u could give taric a visual and a splash?
Maybe even adding some spice to his kit might be nice.

thank you for considering!
Yeah but.... why?
Taric has been confirmed to be the next champion to get a rework so yes, he will be getting a rework
Yeah she didnt really have a skin like this before thats why I like it but I think you're on to something.
I completely agree
Zyra also due for new skin and this skin line is basically made for her!
kelderwood kindred wold've looked far better
boobies
Logged on just to thumbs dis up XD
OH. That's a LeBlanc skin, and not a Zyra rework.

LOL zyras still good though
ive been having a 75% win rate with her out of 26 games lol as sup.
That's pretty much what i clicked through to see, sadness +1
Nice
Ty oce community for downrating this xD. Was contemplating opening the link but saw the rating on the comment xD!
Very nice skin
{{champion:24}} {{champion:5}} {{champion:11}} How can you control that LeBlanc clone?
Hold down [Alt] and right click like normal.
i was watching the video. instead of wanting the lb skin i really wanted the hecarim skin XD ive never seen that skin b4 0-0
When is the new Kha skin becoming available  I need it in my life {{champion:121}} {{item:3070}}
Very soon. We're just waiting for his wings to blossom, then the murder bug will be ready to deal out pretty sweet scented death. Murder bug...murder flower? No wait: Murder bud.
I love this skin. I can't wait to buy it. I hope Zyra gets one next >:D
Screw {{champion:7}} I WANT DEATH BLOSSOM {{champion:121}} !!!!

hey riot, found a bug in the game FOR TEHE FIRST TIME but going on, i was playing riven and teleport has a 225 second cdr but when i flashed from a khazix i noticed my flash was 3 mins 25 seconds and my mind was like wtf so ik for sure flash is 5 min cdr but was 225 i had flash and tp so u might wanna fix this on the next patch <3

ur welcome riot :)
cdr boots and certain masteries can lower the cooldown of summoner spells
i understand now lol I just remembered
i wish there was a elderwood warwick skin
I got the riddle, its an anagram for "I am Lord Voldemort"{{champion:27}}
{{champion:24}} How do you control the clone?
Taric rework when?{{champion:44}}
TARIC REWORK

which is a bad thing.
